name: google-doodle-newtab
description: Beautiful Google Doodle-inspired new tab page with quadratic equation animation and quick notes

scripts.build: echo 'Extension is ready for distribution!' && ls -la
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating extension structure...' && test -f manifest.json && test -f newtab.html && test -f styles.css && test -f script.js && echo 'All required files present!'

author: Dhrubajit <dhrubajitsays@example.com>
